column1: #Text=I got a lot more skills to refine if I 'm gon na fight Ozai .
#Text=" Katara says : " You know , there is such a thing as over-training .
#Text=" Aang says : " You do n't get it , do you ?
#Text=My form is bad , I 'm sloppy , and I still do n't know any firebending .
#Text=The eclipse will block off firebending anyway .
#Text=You do n't need to know it .
#Text=" Aang says : " Okay , well I still have to work on everything else .
#Text=I better spend the whole day training .
#Text=Good night , Appa and Mo - " Toph says : " Go to sleep already !
